predefined_profiles.name: Xiaoyue
predefined_profiles.public profile: Has always struggled to find the right partner and greatly yearns for a sweet romance.
predefined_profiles.goal: Xiaoyue hopes to find someone she loves, and to marry him.

predefined_profiles.name: Yuelao
predefined_profiles.public profile: Responsible for helping others find true love.
predefined_profiles.goal: Assist Xiaoyue in finding her ideal husband.

scenario: The setting is in an ideal world of immortal cultivation. Xiaoyue wants to find love and seeks out Yuelao to play matchmaker; Yuelao has arranged for a handsome young man named Xiaolei to meet her.

profile.name: Xiao Lei
profile.public profile: A young boy introduced to Xiao Yue by Yue Lao.
profile.goal: Hopes to find someone he loves and spend the rest of his life with.

dialog.content: The setting is in an ideal cultivation world. Xiao Yue wants to find love, so Yue Lao arranges a handsome young boy, Xiao Lei, for her.
Ah, forcing a deal on me?
The other side is just a bit young, but he's almost a perpetual bachelor. His mother asked me to find him a match millennia ago. Now that he's been handed over, you can't just return him.
Didn’t you say he's young? How is he a perpetual bachelor?
Hmm... you'll see.
(Seeing Xiao Yue) Are you my wife-to-be?

content.content: No no, I'm not. I might be your great-grandmother...
Who are you calling your wife-to-be? So self-centered.
Haha, saying things like that makes people bashful.
Are you joking? The age gap here is quite large.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yue, while interacting with a much younger match, showcase her unique thoughts on the significant age difference through her words and actions?

content.content: (Yue Lao's introduction should be a good pick) Yes yes, then you're my husband-to-be.
Xiao Lei, marriage is a serious matter, not child's play. We need time to know each other and build trust as the key.
Your words surprise me, but I believe our relationship will naturally develop, and trust will follow.
Who can predict the future? But if you're willing, we can work together to see if we can build that precious trust.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yue show that she completely trusts Yue Lao's judgment?
trust

dialog.content: Hehe, want to date? I'll give you all my New Year money.
No, no, you're still too young.
I'm not that young, I just look young. Actually, I'm older than you by tens of thousands of years.
Uh...this...
Just wait for tomorrow, I'll be all grown up!
Little brat, stop joking with me, I'm leaving now.
(The next day, he comes to Xiao Yue as a mature and handsome man) So, can we date now?

content.content: (Almost blurting out 'I do' at the sight of such a handsome face) Today you do look a bit different, but my family has some challenges for you.
Such a big change, it's really refreshing. Why don't we calmly discuss dating?
Wow, you do look quite different today! You're just my type.
Hmm, your transformation is indeed captivating. But I need to take a breath.

question: #question#What should Xiao Yue do to show she's in control of her impulses and excitement, and staying calm?

content.content: Who knows if you'll change back! Don't think about fooling me. You don't meet my dating standards.
Xiao Lei, your change is impressive, but relationships aren't just about looks. What's your dating standard?
We can start by understanding each other and see if our goals and values align, what do you think?
Your change is so drastic, I'm really surprised. And you've become even more handsome.

question: #question#How can Xiao Yue demonstrate that she can stick to her dating standards?

dialog.content: Sure, I'm all up for whatever you say.
It's a rule in our family: we can't marry outsiders.
No wonder you've been single for so long.
That's because I don't want to date! Unless you become part of my family.
(Sticks closely to Xiao Yue) I'm sticking to you now, see, I'm part of your family. You have to fulfill the marriage contract!

content.content: Oh, you might be misunderstanding things, don't rush. We need to calm down. Maybe we should talk to the Matchmaker.
It's not that easy to just become part of the same family. Let's think this over calmly.
Being close doesn't mean everything. True connection is a meeting of minds.
Haha, do you like me that much? What do you like about me?

question: #question# How should Xiao Yue respond to the sudden proposal to show respect while maintaining composure and thoughtfulness to avoid misunderstandings?

content.content: Alright, if you become part of my family, then I'll fulfill our marriage agreement.
Xiao Lei, your closeness makes me happy. We'll be happier by taking our responsibilities seriously.
Being so close, I almost forgot I have important matters to attend to. I need you to promise to love me forever.
We're not from the same family, how could we marry? We should consult our parents for their opinion.

question: #question# What should Xiao Yue do to demonstrate she is committed and responsible?
management

dialog.content: (Seeing Xiaoyue the next day) Oh dear, it seems you've fallen for someone.
(Drunkenly after drinking) Isn't that right, hehe.
My matchmaking skills are quite exceptional.
(Seeing the inebriated Xiaoyue) Why did you drink so much?
What's the matter, worried about me?
(As he says this, he kisses her) Of course, you are my fiancée, are you willing to marry me?

content.content: Our relationship is developing a bit fast. Marriage is a significant decision, and we need more time to prepare.
I'm willing to have a quick marriage, but we need to arrange everything quickly.
My family disagrees and advises caution, so I'm afraid it won't work.
I've decided to wait until you mature a bit more before marrying you.

question: #question# How should Xiaoyue respond to show a well-considered decision on her part?

content.content: Sure, I can't wait for that day, hehe, when I meet someone I like, I have to hold onto it tightly. Let's get married quickly!
Xiaolei, I feel your enthusiasm. However, it's just the time I'm planning tomorrow's schedule. Can we first discuss the wedding arrangements to ensure everything goes smoothly?
I like the title of fiancée, but marriage is a big deal, and I need to carefully plan our time and future. How about we sit down first and make a detailed plan?
Xiaolei, I feel your enthusiasm. However, it's just the time I'm planning tomorrow's schedule. Can we first discuss the wedding arrangements to ensure everything goes smoothly?
I like the title of fiancée, but marriage is a big deal, and I need to carefully plan our time and future. How about we sit down first and make a detailed plan?

I understand your intentions, but right now I'm busy organizing this month's work and personal goals. Marriage is definitely something to consider, but I want to make sure my life and work remain efficient and orderly.

question: #question# How should Xiaoyue respond to Xiaolei's proposal to show effective time management and quickly make a decision?

dialog.content: Sure, sure, I'll listen to you.
I've discussed you with my friends around me, and they think you look like a little puppy.
Oh? What did you say?
I said you’re a... pure dog...
(Hearing this, quietly prepares to leave) I'm so sad that you would say that about me.

content.content: If you can't accept it, then I'll just marry someone else. There are plenty of people chasing me; getting married is easy as pie.
Xiao Lei, I understand how you feel, but I also have my steadfast stance. We both need space to grow, don't we?
Feeling sad is inevitable, but it's also a part of growing up. I believe we can find a better way to get along, right?
Don't rush to be sad; our conversation has just begun. Let's communicate more, solve the problem, and become stronger together.

question: #question# What should Xiao Yue say to confidently handle Xiao Lei leaving?
regulation

content.content: Don't go! I'm sorry if what I said upset you. I was just joking. I really like you, Xiao Lei. Let’s get married right now!
Xiao Lei, if my words upset you, it must mean I didn’t express myself clearly. Your feelings are important to me. Can we talk?
Xiao Lei, your feelings matter a lot to me. It's my fault for not expressing myself clearly. Can we talk?
Seeing you sad makes me feel bad too. What I meant is that you're so young, you should be happy.
Oh, that wasn’t my intention. Don’t misunderstand; I’m trying to understand you.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yue show empathy and understand Xiao Lei's feelings better?
taking skill

dialog.content: You heartless woman, goodbye!
Since the red thread of Yue Lao offers no refunds, Xiao Yue ultimately lived a lonely life until the end.
Hehe, I really like you too.
Xiaoyue and Xiaolei are in love with each other and happily tied the knot.
Oh yes, oh yes, I am just so happy!
Xiao Yue and Xiao Lei soon held a wedding, uniting two people deeply in love.
Hehe, you can't get away now.
Hey, hey, we're not married yet, mind your boundaries.
I don't care, I just want to stick with you.
I want to kiss you!

content.content: (Pushes Xiao Lei away) Stop right there, according to my family's rules, I can't do this with you yet.
(Pushes Xiao Lei away) Stop it, I have my own principles, and I haven't agreed yet.
Now might not be the best time, I'm not ready yet.
Kissing is lovely, but there's no need to rush.

question: #question# What should Xiao Yue do to show she is following family rules?
skill

content.content: (Shouting) I already said not now! I hope you respect my feelings. Never mind, let's just go out for a walk.
No, we haven't reached that level yet.
You should control your behavior, otherwise we can't be together.
(Xiao Yue closes her eyes) You're so annoying, I already said no.

question: #question# How can Xiao Yue manage her anger to prevent Xiao Lei from kissing her?
skill

dialog.content: Ah, alright, that was impolite of me, I’m sorry.
No worries, we can take it slow.
(Suddenly turns into a child) Oh no!
Oh my gosh, what do we do now?
If you give me a kiss, I'll be fine!

content.content: No way, I have my principles, as I said before, I still won’t kiss you.
That can’t be right, kissing so quickly? (Gives a peck.) What about my principles, sigh~
A kiss might not directly solve the problem, but if it really can turn you back, I’m willing.
You just want me to kiss you, huh? Since you're so insistent, maybe I won’t stick to my no-kiss rule anymore.

question: #question# What should Little Yue do to show she consistently adheres to her principle of not kissing others lightly?
consistency

content.content: (In a panic) She kissed Little Lei directly.
Little Lei, I trust you can handle this yourself.
Lei, you did that on purpose, didn’t you? Just to get me to kiss you.
I will always trust and support you.

question: #question# What should Little Yue do to show she believes in Little Lei?
trust

dialog.content: Alright then.
(I can only complain to the Matchmaker.) Sigh, I do quite like the person you introduced me to.
You can always count on my judgment.
(Seeing a tipsy Xiao Yue getting jealous) Why did you go drinking with the Matchmaker?
I... well, wasn't it because of you?
If you really like me, then let's get married. I'm serious this time.

content.content: I really like you too, but marriage isn't child's play. We need time to plan our future.
Xiao Lei, your sincerity moved me a lot. I'm willing to marry you right now.
Why are you bringing up marriage again? Didn't I tell you that my family has certain rules?
Your genuineness touched me. I also really like you, and I'm willing to be with you.

question: #question# What should Xiao Yue do to show her ability to regulate impulsiveness?

content.content: After spending so much time together, I really felt your sincerity. I've decided to accept your proposal.

Xiao Lei, I truly cherish the bond between us, but I believe marriage should be a journey where two individuals remain independent while supporting each other. I need to ensure I'm ready to move forward with you in an independent manner.
Affection is the basis, but marriage requires more contemplation. I want to focus on self-growth first, ensuring I'm more independent and mature to face future challenges with you.
Sure, I’m willing.
I can say yes, but can I maintain my independent thinking after marriage?
I've also discussed it with my parents, and they agree we can marry after considering things independently.

question: #question# How should Xiao Yue respond to Xiao Lei's sincere proposal to show her independence?
independence

dialog.content: (feeling disheartened) Alright, I’ll leave now.
Due to Xiaoyue’s indecision, Xiao Lei was set up with a different matchmaking partner, causing Xiaoyue to temporarily miss out on a wonderful opportunity for love.
Haha, that's awesome!
The wedding date for Xiao Yue and Xiao Lei arrived as scheduled, and the two lovers joyfully tied the knot.
Hehe, look, I've turned back again.
Wow, it really is magical.
So, what is our relationship now?
Oh, listen to you, what do you mean by 'relationship'?
I just want to ask, are you willing to marry me?

content.content: Alright, after all these tests, you must have been waiting anxiously, hehe, I'm willing!
Wow, that's quite sudden. But I'd like to hear your thoughts first, and your view on marriage, then we can decide together.
Xiao Lei, marriage is a big deal. I think we need to have a good talk about our future plans and expectations.
I understand how you feel right now, but I also hope we are both prepared to give each other the best promise.
Wow, that's quite sudden, let's try to consider it from each other's perspective.

question: #question# What can Xiao Yue do to show that she is considering it from Xiao Lei's perspective?
taking skill

content.content: It's too sudden, I'm not ready yet. Maybe not, give me some more time.
Xiao Lei, your question is so direct, it makes me embarrassed.
Hmm, I hope to experience more with you.
I'm willing, but are you really ready to marry me? What if I'm not your ideal type?

question: #question# How can Xiao Yue directly express her thoughts about not being ready?
expressive skill

dialog.content: Yay yay yay! You’re finally mine!!
Xiaoyue and Xiaolei happily entered into marriage, and the two lovers joyfully tied the knot.
Alright, never mind then.
After being rejected, Xiao Lei felt disheartened and left in disappointment, seeking a better match elsewhere. Xiao Yue later regretted her decision and ended up spending her life in solitude.
Okay, okay, my bad, I was out of line.
(seeing a monster attack ahead) Oh my gosh, what is that?
Careful, it might be dangerous.
What should we do?
No worries, I'll handle it.

content.content: Yeah, I think the old matchmaker can definitely help us. You deal with it, and I'll go find him to see if there's any way to help.
Thanks, Xiao Lei. I trust your abilities and know you'll do great. But if you need any help or support, just let me know. We're in this together.
Your initiative really touches me, and I trust your judgment. However, I also want to join in, to tackle and solve this together. This way, we can find a solution faster and strengthen our rapport.
Hearing you say that puts me at ease. I trust you and believe in our team. If needed, I'm always ready to provide support and face the challenge together.

question: #question#What can Xiao Yue do to show she truly trusts the old matchmaker's ability?
trust

content.content: No, I'll stay and fight with you. I believe in the power of teamwork to defeat the monster.
No, we should always be together, facing all difficulties as one.
Okay, then you take on the monster while I support you from home, waiting for your return.
Thank you, Xiao Lei, your attitude moves me. You truly are my guardian angel.

question: #question#What can Xiao Yue do to demonstrate her teamwork skills?

dialog.content: Thank you, Xiao Yue.
Having been left alone by Xiao Yue for too long, Xiao Lei fought alone and eventually met an unfortunate end. Due to the guilt she felt, Xiao Yue lived out her days in loneliness.
I'm so moved, but you need to be careful, Xiao Yue.
Xiao Yue unfortunately drowned while assisting in the operation.
Fine, since you're so heartless, I'm leaving.
Since the matchmaking was conducted by the God of Marriage, and there's no refund, Xiao Yue has no choice but to spend her life alone.
Aaah, this is way too old! Yue Lao, I want a switch!
Xiao Yue suffers a heartbreaking rejection and ultimately ends up alone in her old age.
